name: Shop Stop!
description:
Shop Stop! was a collab project between 5 developers for a fun YouTube video!

In the game you are tasked with collecting items from around the super market for the demanding customers at the front of the store. All whilst trying to avoid the murderous bean cans that are trying to stop you!

In its current state the game is playable but frustrating - I will be updating the game as part of a series of livestreams on my channel in the coming days / weeks and will upload new builds here as part of that!

We are also including the Unity project files for anyone who wants to dig around the project for themselves.

Here are all the developers and their YouTube channels who worked on the game:

DanPos (www.youtube.com/danpos)

TheShelfman (www.youtube.com/TheShelfman)

Tarodev (www.youtube.com/Tarodev)

GamesBySaul (www.youtube.com/GamesBySaul)

samyam (www.youtube.com/samyam)
